requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 185 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or i7 3000+ with 4 cores. AMD 6200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 280 or R5 330 (2GB) nVidia GTX 950 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i7/i9 3000+ ( 4+ core) or Ryzen 8+ core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 500 series (2GB+) nVidia 10 series (2GB+)
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
